Package net.silthus.schat.pointer

Interface Pointer<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the value type
All Known Subinterfaces:
Setting<V>
public sealed interface Pointer<V> permits Setting<V> (not exhaustive)
A pointer to a resource.

    • forward

      @NotNull static <T> @NotNull Supplier<T> forward(@NonNull @NonNull Pointered pointered, @NonNull @NonNull Pointer<T> targetPointer)
      Creates a forward pointer to a pointer of another pointered resource.

      The forwarder returns a null value of the pointer does not exist or its value is null in the target.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the value type of the pointer
      Parameters:
      pointered - the forward target
      targetPointer - the pointer on the forward target
      Returns:
      a supplier that forwards to the given pointer
      Since:
      next

    • forwardWithDefault

      @NotNull static <T> @NotNull Supplier<T> forwardWithDefault(@NonNull @NonNull Pointered pointered, @NonNull @NonNull Pointer<T> targetPointer, @Nullable T defaultValue)
      Creates a forward pointer with a default value to a pointer of another pointered resource.

      The forwarder returns the default value if the pointer does not exist in the target.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the value type of the pointer
      Parameters:
      pointered - the forward target
      targetPointer - the pointer on the forward target
      defaultValue - the default value to use if the target pointer does not exist
      Returns:
      a supplier that forwards to the given pointer
      Since:
      next

    • weak

      @NotNull static <V, T> @NotNull Supplier<V> weak(@NonNull T type, @NonNull @NonNull Function<T,V> value)
      Creates a dynamic pointer that will hold a weak reference to the given type required to resolve the pointer.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the value type
      T - the reference type
      Parameters:
      type - the type used to resolve the pointer
      value - the resolver of the pointer
      Returns:
      the pointer supplier

    • weak

      @NotNull static <V, T> @NotNull Supplier<V> weak(@NonNull T type, @NonNull @NonNull Function<T,V> value, @Nullable V fallbackValue)
      Creates a dynamic pointer that will hold a weak reference to the given type required to resolve the pointer.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the value type
      T - the reference type
      Parameters:
      type - the type used to resolve the pointer
      value - the resolver of the pointer
      fallbackValue - the value to use if the reference is expired
      Returns:
      the pointer supplier
